mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS cardId, c.card_number AS cardNumber, m.name AS cardholderName, b.bank_name AS cardCompany, cp.card_image_url AS cardImageUrl FROM card c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id JOIN bank b ON cp.bank_code = b.id WHERE c.id = #{cardId}
SELECT cp.card_product_name AS cardName, b.bank_name AS cardCompany FROM card c JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id JOIN bank b ON cp.bank_code = b.id WHERE c.id = #{cardId}
SELECT sb.description FROM card c JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id JOIN store_benefit sb ON sb.card_product_id = cp.id WHERE c.id = #{cardId}
